Name: My House
About the game: Build your house according to your desires in My House! Let your creativity express itself in a chill atmosphere! Choose the layout of the room, the size, the color, the shape ... A lot of furniture will allow you to put style in your house! Features: ■ Chill and relaxing game! ■ Easy to handle! ■ Several choices of paintings! ■ A lot of furniture! ■ Nice background music!
